name: The Weather Painter Snow
text: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can place 1 "Weather" Spell/Trap from your Deck in your Spell & Trap Zone face-up. You can only use this effect of "Snow Weather Ciel" once per turn. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase of the next turn after this card on the field was banished to activate a "Weather" card's effect: You can Special Summon this banished card.
